name: Cherenkov Overdrive
description:
Description :

The secret services of our country just gathered critical information and materials from the enemy to start a new generation of nuclear reactors, or more.

Your goal as Lead scientist of your country is to start the reaction and keep it running.

Keep the temperature too low, and the reactor will stop; forever.

Allow the temperature to rise too high, and the reactor will explode and destroy your country; forever.

Considering no one have any idea how to use the control panel that was stolen, success will be tough. But our leader trust in you.

How to play the game :

You can't, it's not playable. Inputs and Outputs have not been defined.

I had only few hours out of three days to create that game :/

How it should have been played :

Start the reaction by pressing the big red button.

There are three panels, each panel have a set of vintage controllers/indicators (lever, buttons, nixie tubes, etc) and one main indicator for the state of that panel.

These three main indicators display how good or terrible the reaction is going.

The Monitor display the current state of the nuclear reactor. If it gets too dark the reactor will stop and if it gets too blue the reactor will explode.
